body:
As we add public binary mirrors to Spack, we will need a way to distribute public keys for gpg signed binaries.

For Spack-hosted binary mirrors, that mechanism will be the `share/spack/keys` directory. (There will be another mechanism for a mirror to self-host a key eventually).

The first key in this new directory is the public key for the Spack tutorial. It is named `tutorial.pub`.
title: add tutorial public key to new shared keys dir
